article_title: Guterres: Sexual violence by Hamas must be investigated.
sentence: The  UN  secretary-general  said  there  were  numerous  accounts  of  sexual  violence  during  the  "abhorrent  acts  of  terror  by  Hamas  on  7  October"  which  saw  thousands  injured,  more  than  1,200  people  killed  and  about  240  people  abducted.
